attributes.background: Increase consequences for sexual harassment & increase security where needed. Free services to victims for all genders. Fund free rape alarms when people need them.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Make the minimum penalty for all sexual offences imprisonment: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579986

Minimum 8-year custodial sentence for all violent crime and sexual offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579352

Public inquiry into sexual harassment: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579057

Fund free rape alarms for all: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578966

Provide funding to improve the quality of teaching in schools of sexual violence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580038

If you want the Government to take a specific action different to the above petitions, you could start a new petition requesting this, but would need to be clear what action you want the Government to take, and would need to provide your full name.
